title: Cool Whip
summaries: The Cool Whip is a Hardmode whip. Like other whips, it causes minions to focus on the last-struck enemy.

Upon striking an enemy, it will create a temporary snowflake projectile that chases nearby enemies, dealing 15 damage to them on contact. The summoned snowflake has 30 armor penetration and is not affected by damage bonuses outside of banners. If a snowflake is already summoned, attacking with the whip will reset its timer instead of creating a new one. It also inflicts the Frostbite debuff for 4 seconds.
If the Cool Whip hits multiple targets in a single attack, the damage dealt by each consecutive hit will be reduced by 30%.
